root.name: Wizards and Warriors
root.description: D.W. Bradley, designer of Wizardry V, VI, and VII is back with Wizards & Warriors. A magical sword, combining a blade forged of twin metals, one cursed by evil, the other blessed by the divine has the strength to bring down the evil Pharaoh. The Pharaoh has the power to destroy everyone and everything in the enchanted medieval realm of Gael Serran. With the assistance of Kerah, an angel, and Erathsmedor, a dragon, you must engage on a dangerous quest to uncover the legend of the Sword and bring an end to all evil in the land. Set out on over 100 adventures and quests, customize your character with over 30 unique skills and 50 possible character traits. Own a party of up to 6 characters, choosing from 10 different clans and 15 different character roles, as you venture through massive outdoor regions, including lush forests, grasslands, swamps, mountains and an underwater city, as well as eerie dungeons and castles; all in 3D glory.
